allow: Bash(for file in install/*.sh shell/functions.d/*.sh bin/*)

Bash(/bin/bash -c '
for file in install.sh install/*.sh shell/functions.d/*.sh bin/*; do
  if [[ -f ""$file"" && ""$file"" == *.sh ]] || [[ -f ""$file"" && -x ""$file"" ]]; then
    issues=$(shellcheck ""$file"" 2>&1 | grep -c ""SC[0-9]"" || echo ""0"")
    if [[ ""$issues"" != ""0"" ]]; then
      echo ""$file: $issues issues""
    else
      echo ""$file: âœ“ clean""
    fi
  fi
done
')
Bash(for tool in jq ripgrep fzf neovim tmux htop bat eza fd delta lazygit)
Bash(for tool in eza fd delta lazygit gh kubectl k9s helm terraform ansible vault yq)
